invocations.description: Iterates through through each new dead creature, storeing its pointer in the variable c. For more information, visit this.
invocations.ex:
auto(100)

foreach deadcreature c do
	print(c.name .. ' died on ' .. table.concat({c.posx, c.posy, c.posz}, ', '))
end
invocations.exDescription: As soon as a creature dies, prints its name and the position where the body can be found.
